lawName: New buildings construction allowed in high and very high fire hazard areas
New buildings construction allowed in medium, low, and very low fire hazard areas
Minimum distance of protection zone from the property boundary (when adjoining forest, scrubland, or natural pastures)
Minimum distance of protection zone from the property boundary (when adjoining agricultural land, moderate hazard)
Minimum distance of protection zone from the property boundary (when adjoining agricultural land, low hazard)
Minimum distance of protection zone from the property boundary (when adjoining agricultural land, very low hazard)
Protection zone distance measured from exterior wall of the building
Need to adopt measures for containing potential ignition sources
Existence of a favorable opinion from CMDF
Integration of secondary or primary network, road infrastructure, or water plans in the protection zone when present
